name: Extra Hail of Arrows
text: You are a master at raining arrows upon your foes.
benefit: You can use your hail of arrows ability one additional time per day.
special: You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, you can use this ability one additional time per day.
text_zh: 你特别擅长将箭雨倾洒在敌人的脑门上。
benefit_zh: 你每天可以多施展一次箭雨职业能力。
special_zh: 你可以多次选取此专长。你每次选取此专长，每天便能再多施展一次箭雨职业能力。
